Name: Movement-related artefacts (MR-ART) dataset
HowToAcknowledge: If you use these data, please cite the dataset and our associated paper published in Scientific Data.
Funding: Hungarian National Research, Development and Innovation Office (GINOP-2.2.1-18-2018-00001)
EthicsApprovals: The research protocol used for collecting the dataset was approved by the National Institute of Pharmacy and Nutrition (file number: OGYEI/70184/2017).
